column5: Our private room features a queen sized bed, flat screen HDTV with a ChromeCast and DirecTV (over 300+ channels), a private bathroom with tub shower, desk with swivel chair, private mini-fridge, and a door for direct access to the pool!  The room is conveniently located only minutes from the Telecom Corridor, UTD, a 2-minute drive to the grocery store, restaurants, and night life!
column8: Comfort of your own Home in North Dallas
